file_content.text: Stop! I told you everything I know!
You have a reprieve for the moment, Hutt. We have visitors.
Major, come and greet our guests.
Let your prisoners go. We can settle this ourselves.
Release Broga and Treeg.
You still choose to believe that Major Treeg is my prisoner! How positively naive.
How could you turn on the Republic? What did the Empire promise you?
Treeg, why did you do it?
You can't win.
Oh, bravado? How fascinating! No wonder Treeg grew weary of the Republic.
The Republic is sick. Indecisive half-wits like Korvan make general while men of action get passed by.
Despite all my talent and years of service, I'd have died a major in the Republic. The Empire will give me a fleet!
The Empire isn't exactly a shining example of equality. They'll never give real power to a Zabrak.
Imperials don't like aliens.
It's true. You were exceedingly foolish to believe anything I promised you.
Think about what you're doing.
Spare us your platitudes.
You betrayed and murdered the men who served under you for a promotion? What's wrong with you?
You murdered your own men!
Indeed, life is unfair, innocents suffer, etcetera, etcetera. Are we done expressing fruitless moral outrage, now?
Aaaaah! What...?
That was pure Quesh venom. Kill them, and you get the antidote. Fail me, and you die.
I've injected you with raw Quesh venom. Kill the Jedi, and I'll give you the antidote.
That was pure Quesh venom. Kill the captain over there, and I will give you the antidote.
That raw Quesh venom will make you quite powerful before it kills you. Destroy our guest there, and I'll give you the antidote.
That was raw Quesh venom. You will die in terrible pain unless you kill our intruder.
Let's finish this!
Dracen! May he be covered in boils, catch fire and fall into the mouth of a Sarlacc! Make him suffer for me!
When you crush the Hutt Cartel's droids, spit on them for me, would you? Those backstabbing scum....
